app.title: Liven: Discover yourself
app.description:
Liven is your self-discovery companion, a system of tools designed to help you better understand and transform yourself. 

WHO‚ÄôS LIVEN FOR?  
‚Ä¢ For you, me, anyone trying to survive in this hyperstimulated world.    
‚Ä¢ For those under pressure, living to meet others‚Äô expectations, or struggling to say ‚Äòno‚Äô.  
‚Ä¢ For those wanting to build a positive self-image, improve focus, or manage time.  
‚Ä¢ For anyone ready to liven up!

Are you ready to take your inner dialogue out of your head and gain a new perspective on life? Because if you are, we‚Äôve got tools to help you observe your experiences and reframe your days. Sounds good?

  

CHECK OUT OUR APPROACH:

‚Ä¢ Personalized program

Set a clear, achievable goal‚Äîwhether it's improving your self-image, saying "no," or challenging negative thoughts. Choose your direction, and we'll help you get there with evidence-based techniques and tools.‚Ä®

‚Ä¢ Mood tracker

Pause during the day to check in with your emotions. See how you're doing‚ÄîGood, Bad, Amazing! Use our emotional menu to name your feelings, notice what triggered them, and track changes over time with the Mood Calendar.

‚Ä¢ Routine builder

Check out our Tasks tool to plan new activities and get ideas for things to try each day. By adding new tasks and routines to your days, you can change your behaviour and transform.  ‚Ä®

‚Ä¢ AI companion

Ever wish someone would listen to you rant without judgment, even at 3 a.m.? Meet Livie, our AI companion. If you're tired of the inner dialogue or need a fresh perspective on life, just talk to her. She'll help you break down your situations and suggest new ideas to try. ‚Ä®

‚Ä¢ Bite-size knowledge

Scientists have studied the human mind for over 100 years, uncovering how our emotions, thoughts, and actions connect to unconscious "auto-pilot" behaviors. We've distilled this knowledge into bite-sized insights for you to apply in your decision-making.    ‚Ä®

‚Ä¢ Well-being tests

Everyone loves quizzes! Take a break and answer a set of questions to define experiences you‚Äôre going through. Check back every week to track the changes in emotional and behavioural dynamics.       ‚Ä®

‚Ä¢ Deep focus soundscapes

When you don‚Äôt feel like listening to music but still want to wear headphones and block out the world, try our soundscapes.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

WHAT OUR USERS ARE SAYING ABOUT US

"Positive thoughts and a calmer attitude come after 10 minutes of use."

"Great app to use as a guide at the start of your day."

"Liven is helping me turn healthy activities into habits."

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS
After you decide to begin your growth with Liven and download the app, you can unlock all features by subscribing to the premium subscription.
If you choose to purchase a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase.


Our app aims to provide you with helpful guidance on mindfulness. However, it is important to note that the information presented in the app is for general purposes only, and should not be considered as a substitute for professional medical care.

Livie is not a substitute for professional advice. It helps you understand your feelings, discover self-care ideas, and manage overwhelming thoughts. Please consult a professional if you need medical advice.

This app is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any health conditions, and may not be suitable for everyone.

Therefore, we strongly advise that you consult with a healthcare professional before adopting any advice or activities suggested in the app.
Please use this app at your discretion, and always keep in mind your own unique needs and circumstances.

Privacy Policy: https://quiz.theliven.com/en/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://quiz.theliven.com/en/terms-of-use

reviews.title: Fake ratings

No help with the app. Says to journal stuff each day? I could write in my notes just fine. Has sounds that do not help with sleep or focus. Just a whole bunch of lies on this app. If you fell for it, be sure to search subscriptions and turn off auto renew. Horrible app, horrible company.

reviews.author: )p.a.r.k.y(
reviews.title: Useless content, money trap
reviews.content:
First of all the content is fairly useless to me. Knowing *what* I need to do isn‚Äôt the problem, knowing *how* to do it is. This app does not help with that at all. 
Secondly the funding model is designed in such a way as to prey on the characteristics of the neurodiverse people the app is marketed to.
Folks with ADHD will sign up to this app and then forget to cancel before being hit with huge monthly fees. It feels like a scam.

reviews.author: AdamJ (UK)
reviews.title: Pricey subscription and dubious mention of OpenAI in privacy policy

reviews.author: Shellye_e
reviews.title: ‚ÄºÔ∏èMisleading Subscription ‚Äì Be Careful‚ÄºÔ∏è
reviews.content:
The app itself may work fine, but the subscription model is like a trap. I trialed it without realizing I‚Äôd be rolled into a ¬£49.99 monthly plan ‚Äî almost ¬£600 a year ‚Äî when the same app costs just ¬£59.99 annually. I was charged over ¬£460 for something I never used, while other customers pay a fraction of that.

The terms are hidden in small print, and from the number of similar reviews, I‚Äôm clearly not the only one caught out. Please make this clearer and stop setting customers up to fail.

This feels like stealing from unsuspecting customers and gives me that feeling that this is a semi scam company! BEWARE!!

reviews.content:
I wasn‚Äôt using this app at all. I forgot I‚Äôd even installed it until a few months later when I was hit with an auto renewal charge of ¬£99.

I saw it pending in my bank and even contacted my bank about it as if completely forgot I‚Äôd even installed this app.

I had no email, no notifications from the app telling me I was going to be charged. Absolutely nothing. 

I‚Äôm writing this review as I don‚Äôt want others to fall victim to this!

I'm sure it's all done with integrity & care, but after my 3 month discounted trial, I hope I'll have ingrained habits that will allow me to return to Vita Minds material from the NHS. That material just seems more real & rich TBH. Thaks anyhow - I'll save giving hundreds of pounds to a few people at the top raking in the profits for unchanging content. No need to Reply!

reviews.author: JayBird1438
reviews.title: Doesn‚Äôt do what was advertised, scam auto renewal tactics
reviews.content: It did not have the features that were heavily advertised on social media to reduce doom scrolling. It was not straightforward to use with too many options of where to go. Even when I researched how to use the app to achieve the outcome advertised it was not straightforward and very vague how this app would help me. And after turning the auto subscribe feature off 12 months ago suddenly I‚Äôm now subscribed and charged for a 3 month subscription. I can‚Äôt have accidentally left it on because the 3 monthly charge turned on 12 months after I turned it off.

reviews.author: CptMarkSad
reviews.title: After few hours of using
reviews.content:
The app asks for a feedback right after the first wow impressions and initial self-tests. Later it becomes mostly about reading long texts with only small tests at the end of the each chapter. For someone with ADHD I don‚Äôt find reading articles to be the best approach. I would personally prefer more videos, interactive activities or playful events.

After two days of use, I already started to feel bored. I would have given 3 stars if there is a trial version with the option of refund, but since I purchased a 3-month plan and lost interest after just two days, I am rating it this way.

reviews.author: iphoneuseraus17
reviews.title: Fraudulent
reviews.content:
This is an app I am not familiar with, however the app somehow fraudulently charged me $150. 
I‚Äôm not sure how it ended up on my phone but I‚Äôd never used it. The app charged $150 to my account. I disputed many times to Apple and bank etc and even contacted the app. The app claimed they couldn‚Äôt refund me at all, had no contacts etc. Every other avenue refused refund even though fraudulent transaction. Do not download, do not open, be cautious of this app and fraudulent payments. I lost $150 and it heavily affected us in a cost of living crisis. Avoid if you don‚Äôt want to risk being scammed!!

reviews.author: agallo96
reviews.title: Not useful if you have already done CBT
reviews.content: The app is not bad if you don‚Äôt know the concepts of CBT or haven‚Äôt done it before. The selling point for me was that the app was ‚Äúindividualised‚Äù, so even if you have done therapy before it was marketed to still be new, useful information. The entire ‚Äújourney‚Äù on the app for me was just the foundations of CBT‚Äîthoughts, feelings, and actions. The examples were not relevant to my situation and it was not very helpful. I also completed the entire program for me in a couple of weeks. If you want to try the app, don‚Äôt get a 3-month membership. I‚Äôve now paid for something I can‚Äôt use and I assume you can‚Äôt get a refund. It‚Äôs definitely not worth a subscription just to track your mood and journal. There are many free apps that allow you to do this.
